text: Heinz Pliska (born 23 October 1941) is a retired German footballer. He played in the Bundesliga for Schalke 04. == References == == External links == * Category:1941 births Category:Living people Category:German footballers Category:Association football midfielders Category:Bundesliga players Category:FC Schalke 04 players Category:Sportspeople from Gelsenkirchen
title: Heinz Pliska
